subject: Order wenth through but no email
description_text:
Hi can you help me with my order?
I see transaction went through in my account but I did not get any email
nor I see an order in Simsonn website?

Kind regards,
Ivan

conversations.body_text: Hi Ivan Kolić, ​  I found the order you placed, and the order number is #SSN6173 The email you used is ​kolicivan@outlook.com  So the information about your successful order may have been sent to this email address of yours.
